examples.text:
Kar yağar patul patul
Kabilari diyatur
Bizum var bi Cuhatun
Akşam olmadan yatur
Kakar yari ceceye

glosses: tuft, flock of white wool (carded or uncarded)

etymology: A word confined to the dialects of Pontus. Akin to Armenian փաթիլ (pʻatʻil). See it for more. See also tapul, padul, badul.
